item.title: About
item.description: My name is Tamas and I am a currently working as a Senior Data Analyst at komoot. I was born in Budapest, studied in Leuven and St. Andrews, and have worked in Montreal and Amsterdam. My main area of expertise is digital analytics, however I have worked on projects in a variety of industries such as online media, e-commerce, travel and banking. I love solving business problems with data, discovering new insights and building scalable solutions.
